DESCRIPTION: Setup youtube alerts for your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}youtube subscribe [YouTube Username]** ~ Subscribes to a youtube channel.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}youtube unsubscribe [YouTube Username]** ~ Removes the subscription to a youtube channel.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}youtube list** ~ Lists all youtube users the server has subscribed to.
ALIASES: YouTube does not have any aliases.
SUBSCRIBED: Successfully subscribed to youtube alerts for {{username}} on {{channel}}.
UNSUBBED: Successfully unsubscribed to youtube alerts for {{username}}.
NOT_SUBSCRIBED: The {{username}} has no subscriptions set up for youtube at this time.
NOT_SUBBED: The {{username}} has no subscriptions set up for this channel at this time.
ALREADY_SUBBED: The {{username}} is already subscribed to send alerts in this channel.
NONE: I was unable to find any youtube users that this server has subscribed to.
CUSTOM_MESSAGE: {{mention}}, please provide the message you would like to send when a video is posted for this subscription.
WANT_GAME: {{mention}}, would you like to filter the uploaded videos? Filter your results based on the keyphrase you enter.  For example, want results based around fortnight? Only videos whose title's include the word `fortnight` would be posted. `Note:` If you do not want to filter anything type `skip`.
